questions: Can you elaborate on your experience as a Marine scientist at Shankar Inc? What were your key responsibilities and achievements during your time there?
How have you applied your skills in Node.js, Python, Machine Learning, and Java in your previous work experiences and projects?
What motivated you to pursue a career as a Marine scientist and how do you see yourself growing professionally in this field?
Could you provide more details about your M.Tech in Quis from Ramesh and Sons University? How has this education prepared you for a career in Marine science?
What led you to work on the project titled "User-centric heuristic approach"? Can you explain the impact and outcomes of this project?
How do you stay updated with the latest developments in Marine science and technology? Can you give an example of how you have applied new knowledge in your work?
How do you approach problem-solving and decision-making in your role as a Marine scientist? Can you share a challenging situation you encountered and how you resolved it?
In what ways do you see the field of Marine science evolving in the future, and how do you plan to adapt to these changes?
How do you prioritize and manage your tasks and projects effectively, especially when working on multiple assignments simultaneously?
What are your long-term career goals in the field of Marine science, and how do you plan to achieve them?
